snippet: The Good & Evil bar, made from dark Peruvian Pure Nacional chocolate that grows wild, is likely to put the artisanal company Éclat in the limelight.
abstract: Good & Evil candy bar, which is available online and at Dean & Deluca stores and is made from dark Peruvian Pure Nacional chocolate that grows wild, is likely to put artisanal company Eclat in limelight.
lead_paragraph: The Good & Evil bar, made from dark Peruvian Pure Nacional chocolate that grows wild, is likely to put the artisanal company Éclat in the limelight.

headline.seo: Éclat Chocolate Bar, From Peru via Pennsylvania
